title: Welcome to Hui-Chia Senior Project
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Hui-Chia Senior Project. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!

title: Project Background
contents:
Project Proposal Background
Taiwan’s house prices continue to rise since many years ago, especially in the capital city - Taipei. Taipei is a city where has more job opportunities than other cities in Taiwan. Buying a home remains unaffordable for most young Taiwanese. An average household in Taipei needs to pay two-thirds of its income for a mortgage loan. Most of the young adult who works in Taipei would buy/rent a house in neighbor cities of Taipei, and commute by car/bus/ train for 30 min to 1 hour every workday. It causes the house price in neighboring cities to continually increase.
Keelung, the city where I currently live, is one of the neighboring cities of Taipei but also the farthest one compares to other neighboring cities. I would like to analyze the house price changes in Keelung during these five years.
Goals
Keelung House price analysis
Overall Price increase?
County Average house price differences?

title: How To Read Trade Record
contents:
案件登記欄位標題
基本概念: 平方公尺 X 0.3025= 坪
交易標的
雙方當事人訂立合約所要規範的內容
土地區地段位置
土地移轉總面積
使用分區與編定
都市土地: 實施都市計畫範圍內之土地
非都市土地: 都市計畫範圍外之土地/農業區/工業區
移轉層次 交易物件的樓層數
總樓層數
建物總樓層數
建物型態 公寓(5樓含以下無電梯)
住宅大樓(11層含以上有電梯)
華廈(10層含以下有電梯)
透天厝
套房(1房1廳1衛)
建物移轉總面積
主建物面積和附屬建物面積的總和
總價
交易總金額 建物價格和車位價格的總和
單價
單價是以每平方公尺計算
房屋單價怎麼算？
以建物移轉總面積計算
(總價-車位價)/(總面積-車位面積)=建坪單價
(3,000-200)/(80-10)=40萬元/坪
以不計入共同使用部分面積計算
(總價-車位價)/(總面積-共同使用部分面積-車位面積)=單價
(3,000-200)/(80-10-10)=46.67萬元/坪
以不計入附屬建物及共同使用部分計算
(總價-車位價)/(總面積-附屬建物-共同使用部分面積-車位面積)=單價
(3,000-200)/(80-5-5-10-10)=56萬元/坪
不動產買賣登記哪裡看？
591實價登錄https://market.591.com.tw
資料詳細
不好搜尋地址 輸入社區比較好搜尋
LEJU樂居https://www.leju.com.tw
介面簡單易懂
輸入地段就好搜尋
資料筆數有限（無加入會員）
台灣房屋https://www.twhg.com.tw/price_trend.php
各區域漲跌幅列表
資料太多不好搜尋
內政部交易實價查詢https://lvr.land.moi.gov.tw/login.action
頁面複雜不好操作
